text: I have choose the "licence information communication" because persons like journalist inspire me. I think my interrest for journalism begin when i was a child by Alex Dupont and Alex Dupont who's got this job in their civil life. I think this first vision of the journalist give me a vision of the journalist as an hero  who can help without supernatural power. And the television ( with people like PPDA ) inspire me i think bcause when i ate with my family in front of the TV we were watching the TV information. Nowadays the person inspiring me are journalist like Alex Dupont, Alex Dupont on social media they present reality unpresented at the television. They aren't presenting the information like televesion, they go on the ground and i appreciate this engagement. HugoDecrypte is an other inspiration for me because he share the daily informations easily and on social media so it is easy to acces. And i think information need to be easilly accesible. But news channel inspire me like "BRUT.", "ARTE","NationalGeographic" too. For me these channel present interview and reports who present subjects more researched and advanced insocial issues than what is presented on TV. Alex Dupont is an other inspiration for me because he gave me the tast for the adventur. All this person and news channel are inspiration because they share values and morales that i want to share with other people or futur generations. That's why after my L3 i want to make a school of journalism to be like my inspiration.
